hero.title: Welcome to My Personal Blog
hero.subtitle: This is where I share technical insights, life reflections, and creative ideas. Explore diverse topics and experience the charm of multilingual culture.
blog.title: Latest Articles
about.title: About Me
about.name: Ming Zhang | Full-Stack Developer
about.bio: I am a passionate full-stack developer specializing in web development and multilingual applications. With over 8 years of development experience, I am passionate about exploring the intersection between different cultures and technologies. I am proficient in Chinese, English, Japanese and Korean, which allows me to understand user experience and interface design from multiple perspectives.
about.mission: My mission is to create digital experiences that seamlessly connect users in different languages, break down language barriers, and make technology truly serve global users.
contact.title: Contact Me
contact.message: If you are interested in my blog content or have any collaboration ideas, please feel free to contact me through the following methods. I will reply to your message as soon as possible.
